lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.description: Causes your body to be in shock, receiving additional 0.1% true damage for each Lightning.

darkmagic.name: Dark Magic
darkmagic.description: Enemy steals 1 stamina per round for each stack of Dark Magic element.

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: Deals damage to you every second based on 0.5% of enemy attack damage for each Fire stack.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Making your hero dizzy which causes chance of missing your attack. Increases the chance by 1% for each Poison stack.

ice.name: Ice
ice.description: You have chance of being frozen for 1 round, 2% per 1 stack of Ice element.

water.name: Water
water.description: Slows your attacks by 1% for each stack of Water.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: You were cursed by enemy, causing you to deal 1% less damage for each Curse stack.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: You have gained enough rage to increase your damage. One Rage stack increases your damage by 1%.

endurance.name: Endurance
endurance.description: You have experienced enough pain training, you now gain increased armor by 1% per each Endurance stack.

wisdom.name: Wisdom
wisdom.description: You have got enough wisdom to reduce your cooldown of abilities for 1% for each Wisdom.

dopamine.name: Dopamine
dopamine.description: Dopamine is really powerful, increases your attack speed by 1% for each Dopamine stack.

vitals.name: Vitals
vitals.description: You got strong core vitals which helps you to regenerate 0.01% total health per tick (second).

vamp.name: Vamp
vamp.description: Inherited vamp ability, which allows you to heal by the damage you deal. Each Vamp stack is 1% heal of damage done.
